inclusion.criterion: Children and adolescents aged 7-18 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ASA Score I (American Society of Anesthesiologists classification)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients scheduled for laparoscopic appendectomy surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No evidence of appendiceal perforation based on preoperative clinical and imaging assessment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosed to have simple acute appendicitis by intraoperative laparoscopy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who have provided a written informed assent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Caregivers who have provided a written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: ASA Score III (American Society of Anesthesiologists classification): A patient with severe systemic disease
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 31-year-old woman complaining of abdominal pain. She had poor appetite as well as malaise.
